TopicTitle: KSP 1.11.1 bug Some RCS don't show plume/smoke, only get heated up (reddish nozzle).

Articles.Content: I have some issues with some RCS thrusters, It seems like only the monopropellant RCSs show smoke/plumes but the other ones like Vernier, or those who use LF, OX don't.  Technically they "work", they make thrust and get heated up in the nozzles getting red, but they don't show any plume/smoke effect. I uninstalled all mods and try it and nothing happens. I think is a game bug and It would be super cool if one of you knows what happen and if could share a mod o patch fixer to this because I love RCS thrusters... Cheers from Chile!
Try using KSP 1.11.2, I think that included a fix for the RCS related bugs that came with 1.11,
